title: Property tax assessment
html_content:
This is the last appraisal of 14 Branchland Court made by Greene County before the fire, including relevant headers above the assessment report. The last part of the "Legal Description" indicates that the lot is 0.56 acres (approximately 0.23 ha / 24,000 ft2 / 2,300 m2), and that the total worth of the house and land is $159,100.
